recipe_text: Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 Italian sausage links| Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 Italian hoagie rolls| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of green bell pepper, sliced| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, sliced| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of marinara sauce| Untimed; None; Preheat grill to medium-high heat| Untimed; None; Brush sausages, bell peppers, and onions with olive oil| Untimed; None; Grill sausages, bell peppers, and onions until sausages are cooked through and vegetables are tender| Untimed; None; Warm hoagie rolls on the grill| Untimed; None; Spread marinara sauce inside the rolls| Untimed; None; Place grilled sausages, bell peppers, and onions inside the rolls| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Festival Style Grilled Italian Sausage Sandwiches
